verses.verse: If <WG1437> I speak<WG2980> with the tongues<WG1100> of men<WG444> and<WG2532> of angels<WG32>, but<WG1161> have<WG2192> not<WG3361> love<WG26>, I am become<WG1096> sounding<WG2278> brass<WG5475>, or<WG2228> a clanging<WG214> cymbal<WG2950>.

And <WG2532> if<WG1437> I have<WG2192> the gift of prophecy<WG4394>, and<WG2532> know<WG1492> all<WG3956> mysteries<WG3466> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> knowledge<WG1108>; and<WG2532> if<WG1437> I have<WG2192> all<WG3956> faith<WG4102>, so as<WG5620> to remove<WG3179> mountains<WG3735>, but<WG1161> have<WG2192> not<WG3361> love<WG26>, I am<WG1510> nothing<WG3762>.

And <WG2532> if<WG1437> I bestow<WG5595> all<WG3956> my<WG3450> goods<WG5224> to feed<WG5595> the poor<WG2532>, and if<WG1437> I give<WG3860> my<WG3450> body<WG4983> to<WG2443> be burned<WG2545>, but<WG1161> have<WG2192> not<WG3361> love<WG26>, it profiteth<WG5623> me nothing<WG3762>.
Love <WG26> suffereth long<WG3114>, and is kind<WG5541>; love<WG26> envieth<WG2206> not<WG3756>; love<WG26> vaunteth<WG4068> not<WG3756> itself<WG4068>, is<WG5448> not<WG3756> puffed up<WG5448>,
doth not<WG3756> behave itself<WG807> unseemly<WG807>, seeketh<WG2212> not<WG3756> its own<WG1438>, is<WG3947> not<WG3756> provoked<WG3947>, taketh not<WG3756> account<WG3049> of evil<WG2556>;
rejoiceth <WG5463> not<WG3756> in<WG1909> unrighteousness<WG93>, but<WG1161> rejoiceth<WG4796> with the truth<WG225>;
beareth <WG4722> all things<WG3956>, believeth<WG4100> all things<WG3956>, hopeth<WG1679> all things<WG3956>, endureth<WG5278> all things<WG3956>.

Love <WG26> never<WG3763> faileth<WG1601>: but<WG1161> whether<WG1535> there be prophecies<WG4394>, they shall be done away<WG2673>; whether<WG1535> there be tongues<WG1100>, they shall cease<WG3973>; whether<WG1535> there be knowledge<WG1108>, it shall be done away<WG2673>.
For <WG1063> we know<WG1097> in<WG1537> part<WG3313>, and<WG2532> we prophesy<WG4395> in<WG1537> part<WG3313>;
but <WG1161> when<WG3752> that which is<WG3588> perfect<WG5046> is come<WG2064>, that<WG5119> which is<WG3588> in<WG1537> part<WG3313> shall be done away<WG2673>.

When <WG3753> I was<WG2252> a child<WG3516>, I spake<WG2980> as<WG5613> a child<WG3516>, I felt<WG5426> as<WG5613> a child<WG3516>, I thought<WG3049> as<WG5613> a child<WG3516>: now<WG1161> that<WG3753> I am become<WG1096> a man<WG435>, I have put away<WG2673> childish<WG3516> things<WG3588>.

For <WG1063> now<WG737> we see<WG991> in<WG1223> a mirror<WG1722>, darkly<WG135>; but<WG1161> then<WG5119> face<WG4383> to<WG4314> face<WG4383>: now<WG737> I know<WG1097> in<WG1537> part<WG3313>; but<WG1161> then<WG5119> shall I know<WG1921> fully even as<WG2531> also<WG2532> I was fully known<WG1921>.
But <WG1161> now<WG3570> abideth<WG3306> faith<WG4102>, hope<WG1680>, love<WG26>, these<WG5023> three<WG5140>; and<WG1161> the greatest<WG3187> of these<WG5130> is love<WG26>.
